metadata.title: CVE-2024-27024 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/rds: fix WARNING in rds_conn_connect_if_downIf connection isn't established yet, get_mr() will fail, trigger connectionafterget_mr().
